function getSetReff(){function t(e){return(document.cookie.match("(^|; )"+e+"=([^;]*)")||0)[2]}function _(t,_,r){dd=new Date,dd.setTime(dd.getTime()+24*r*60*60*1e3),e=void 0!==r?";expires="+dd.toGMTString():"",document.cookie=t+"="+_+e+";domain="+n[0].setDomain+";path=/"}function r(e){if(-1!=document.location.search.indexOf(e)){return(""+document.location.search.split(e+"=")[1]).split("&")[0].replace(/\/$/,"")}return"not-set"}Array.prototype.filter||(Array.prototype.filter=function(e){"use strict";if(void 0===this||null===this)throw new TypeError;var t=Object(this),_=t.length>>>0;if("function"!=typeof e)throw new TypeError;for(var r=[],n=arguments.length>=2?arguments[1]:void 0,i=0;i<_;i++)if(i in t){var c=t[i];e.call(n,c,i,t)&&r.push(c)}return r});var n=[];n=dataLayer.filter(function(e){if(e.setDomain)return e}),0===n.length&&(n[0]={setDomain:document.location.hostname});var i=void 0!==t("__sreff")?t("__sreff"):"",c=void 0!==t("__reff")?t("__reff"):"",o=t__apc=[];__tpc=res__apc=__gsr=__nwss="";return-1!=document.location.search.indexOf("utm_campaign")||-1!=document.location.search.indexOf("utm_medium")||-1!=document.location.search.indexOf("utm_source")?(__gsr="//campaign::c:["+r("utm_campaign")+"]m:["+r("utm_medium")+"]s:["+r("utm_source")+"]",__gsr+=-1!=document.location.search.indexOf("gclid")?"g:["+r("gclid")+"]":"",__gsr+=-1!=document.location.search.indexOf("utm_content")?"ct:["+r("utm_content")+"]":"",__gsr+=-1!=document.location.search.indexOf("utm_id")?"id:["+r("utm_id")+"]":""):-1!=document.location.search.indexOf("gclid")?__gsr="//campaign::[adwords]g:["+r("gclid")+"]":__gsr=document.referrer,__gsr="undefined"==typeof __gsr||""==__gsr||-1!=__gsr.indexOf(n[0].setDomain)?"(direct)":__gsr.split("/")[2],i?(o=i.split("."),o[1]=(new Date).getTime(),o[2]++,i=o.join("."),_("__sreff",i)):(o[0]=o[1]=(new Date).getTime(),o[2]=1,i=o.join("."),__nwss=1,_("__sreff",i)),1==__nwss?(res__apc=""!=c?c+"|":"",_("__reff",res__apc+__gsr+"&"+i,730)):(t__apc=c.split("|"),__tpc=t__apc[t__apc.length-1],__tpc=""!=__tpc.split("&")[0]?__tpc.split("&")[0]:__gsr,res__apc=1==t__apc.length?"":t__apc.slice(0,-1).join("|")+"|","(direct)"==__gsr||-1!=__gsr.indexOf(__tpc.split("&")[0])?_("__reff",res__apc+__tpc+"&"+i,730):_("__reff",c+"|"+__gsr+"&"+i,730)),t("__reff")}
